name: Atemporal Bubble
description:
You're an adventurer in search of the mythical Temporal Rune, a stone with the power to stop time.

After years of work you've finally discorved where it is and now is your time to survive the ancient temple filled with traps and escape with the Temporal Rune in your hands.

This is a class project made in 10 weeks and any kind of comment or feedback would be very well recieved.
